name: create-ui-app-cli
description: CLI tool to create React apps with popular UI libraries

scripts.make-dist: if not exist dist mkdir dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run make-dist && esbuild src/index.js --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist/cli.js --external:create-ui-app-cli/package.json && node scripts/fix-shebang.js && npm run copy-presets
scripts.setup: npm cache clean --force && npm install && npm run build && npm uninstall -g create-ui-app-cli && npm link
scripts.reset: rd /s /q node_modules 2>nul & rd /s /q dist 2>nul & npm run setup
